      • schedule_absolute

        public JCSMPTimer schedule_absolute(long time,
                           JCSMPTimeoutHandler handler)
        Description copied from interface: JCSMPTimerQueue
        Schedule a timer for an absolute time in the future.
        Specified by:
        schedule_absolute in interface JCSMPTimerQueue
        Parameters:
        time - Absolute time at which the timer should expire (same format as returned by System.currentTimeMillis()).
        handler - Implementation of the JCSMPTimeoutHandler interface, to run on expiry.
        Returns:
        result

      • schedule_relative

        public JCSMPTimer schedule_relative(long offset,
                           JCSMPTimeoutHandler handler)
        Description copied from interface: JCSMPTimerQueue
        Schedule a timer for a relative time in the future.
        Specified by:
        schedule_relative in interface JCSMPTimerQueue
        Parameters:
        offset - Relative time offset (milliseconds).
        handler - Implementation of the JCSMPTimeoutHandler interface, to run on expiry.
        Returns:
        result

      • getServiceThreadId

        public long getServiceThreadId()
        Gets the TID of the reactor thread, this is useful, for example, if a caller needs to know if it's on the reactor thread.
        Returns:
        The reactor thread's TID.
